name: Boog Doodles
description:
Boog Doodles is a chill narrative game about a young artist on her journey to draw all the fantastic bugs in the land of Slava.

The locations and characters are inspired by Slavic culture and mythology.
And this game was made during the "Game off 2021 game jam" the theme was "bugs".

Team:

Anatole Arakelov: 3D Artist/ 2D Artist

Garabed Khachadour:  World designer/3D Artist

Maretta Aivazian:: 2D Artist

Charbel Bechara: Programmer

Jonathan Urso: Sound Designer
